## IIdentityStorage.getProfileByVerifier() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

gets profile by verifier

**Signature:**

```typescript
getProfileByVerifier(verifier: string): Promise<Profile>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  verifier | string | verifier to which profile has been shared |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[Profile](./polygonid-js-sdk.profile.md)&gt;

`{Promise<Profile>}`
